title: Her Irish Warrior
description: Genevieve de Renalt "must" escape her betrothed, even if that means putting her trust in the hands of the enemy!Irish warrior Bevan MacEgan cannot leave a lady in danger, but how far will he go to keep her safe? Marriage would benefit them both, yet he has sworn never to love again.Proud and strong, he keeps Genevieve at a distance but, as she begins to melt his heart, a shocking discovery forces Bevan to make a choicea choice that could mean losing her forever!"
author: Michelle Willingham
